name: Hebron-must-see
description: # Description  Our website is a tourist guide for Hebron. It provides some services for Hebron new visitors. These services include showing the must-see places in hebron and their ratings. in addition to provide them with a list of most famous tourist guides for hebron tours. Moreover, the tourist can see a list of most common used words in arabic and their pronounciation to help tourists to communicate in the places they go.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
